filecoin_growth_impact:
•	Reduced gas spend: fee caps + batching typically 20–40% savings on sealing/PoSt costs.
•	Fewer failed deals: automated escrow top-ups keep market balances above thresholds → near-zero deal failures from insufficient collateral.
•	Higher throughput: snap-deals + batch sealing increase onboarding efficiency (multi-× depending on hardware).
•	Lower ops overhead: unified UI/alerting cuts manual intervention and error rates.
Together, these effects increase net FIL-denominated deal volume and improve capacity utilization across the portion of the network run on Curio.
description: Curio Storage is the open-source control plane for Filecoin Storage Providers. From Nov-2024 to Sep-2025, we’re shipping GA batch sealing (SupraSeal), automated collateral top-ups, dynamic WindowPoSt fee controls with batching, snap-deal orchestration, RBAC/multi-tenant Web UI, and safe deletion/GC. Operators get one pane of glass for clusters, sectors, and pipelines, plus alerting, structured logging, and IPNI retrieval support. Net impact: lower gas and hardware costs, faster onboarding, fewer failed deals, and higher network reliability-already reflected by Curio running a measurable share of the network.
additional_impact: Safety rails (reviewable GC, wallet exporter), hardened ops best practices (NUMA, hardware sizing, devnet), and horizontal-scale orchestration (Harmony + YugabyteDB) lower barriers for new SPs and help existing providers scale, strengthening decentralization and network resilience.
end_user:
Primary: Filecoin Storage Providers and their SRE/ops teams (solo → enterprise).
Secondary: Data clients and the broader Filecoin network via lower costs, higher reliability, and faster time-to-store.
testimonials: Curio is operator infrastructure (not a developer SDK). We measure impact via adoption and ops outcomes rather than developer testimonials. References from active operators can be shared privately upon request. (If the form forces a number: “N/A – infra product.”)
top_five_dependents:
Market 2.0
Curio PDP
Curio Snark Market
IPNI
Curio Storage
filecoin_users_percentage_using_project: ≈ 6.4% of the Filecoin network operates via Curio-managed clusters.
